title: Please help with sans-serif font
content:
I need to find what this font is for a continuation of an old project as I can’t seem to contact the girl who previously did all the PSing. Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Untitled.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20091115191008/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled.png) | 3.39 KB |
author: J Lim

comments.content:
Your sample is small, but this seems to be consistent with Ray Larabie’s [Sweater School](http://web.archive.org/web/20091115191008/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/sweater-school/). It’s at least quite similar, I think.

- Mike Yanega
